snippet.title: Distant Worlds Trailer
snippet.description:
Distant Worlds: Universe brings you the entire Distant Worlds: Series in one package.  Space 4x Strategy has never been better!  Explore the galaxy and follow the path of the ancients or forge your own new galaxy with limitless options, customizability and replayability.
Available on Matrix Games and Steam May 23rd.
